ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RecipientPersonNm: THE JOHN RANDOLPH HAYNES AND DORA H
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: COVER LETTER FROM THE INSTITUTION SIGNED BY AN ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER, A STATEMENT OF PURPOSE FOR WHICH THE FUNDS WILL BE USED, A DETAILED BUDGET & TIMELINE, NAMES & QUALIFICATIONS OF THE PERSONNEL INVOLVED WITH PERSONAL RESUMES, COPIES OF INSTITUTION'S EXEMPTION LETTERS FROM IRS & FTB.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RecipientPersonNm: THE JOHN RANDOLPH HAYNES AND DORA H
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: COVER LETTER FROM THE INSTITUTION SIGNED BY AN ACADEMIC DEAN OR ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER, A TWO PAGE PROPOSAL STATING THE RESEARCH PROBLEM OR PROJECT GOALS, THE METHODS TO BE USED, AND THE WAY THE GRANT MONEY WILL BE SPENT, A TWO PAGE CONDENSED PERSONAL RESUME.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RecipientPersonNm: THE JOHN RANDOLPH HAYNES AND DORA H
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: LETTER OF RECOMMENDATION SIGNED AND SENT SEPARATELY BY THE APPLICANT'S FACULTY ADVISOR WITH AN ESTIMATION OF THE COMPLETION DATE, ONE PAGE COVER SHEET, SIX PAGE PROPOSAL STATING THE RESEARCH PROJECT, PROJECT GOALS AND METHODS TO BE USED, ONE PAGE BIBLIOGRAPHY LISTING KEY SOURCES OF DIRECT RELEVANCE TO THE DISSERTATION TOPIC, A TWO PAGE CONDENSED PERSONAL RESUME.
